hero.title: Onsite Info
hero.lead: Make the most of your time at the event with essential onsite information at your fingertips.

info.title: Event Schedule
info.content: Discover everything taking place each day by visiting the event schedule page. You can also build your own event schedule from there.

info.title: Event Venue
info.content: Check the travel page for venue location and directions. Parking and rideshare services are typically available in the area.

info.title: Get Connected
info.content: Wi-Fi credentials will be provided at check-in.

info.title: Lost & Found
info.content: Please visit the Lost & Found station for any lost belongings. Contact the help desk for more information.

info.title: Emergencies & Security Issues
info.content: For immediate assistance, please contact event security or visit the Help desk.
